text: The Case of Becky is a 1921 American silent drama movie directed by Chester Franklin and was based on the 1912 play of the same name by David Belasco and Edward J. Locke. It stars Constance Binney, Glenn Hunter, Montagu Love, Margaret Seddon, Jane Jennings and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1921 movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Chester Franklin Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Case of Becky
